column4: can anyone help me? all compiz settings are enable, still no cube?
have you ran: compiz --replace & 2>/dev/null
no not yet
thats why then
not sure what happened. u want result? will that help
well you arent running compiz until you run that command, you can configure all you want but if its not running, the settings dont do anything
thanx, still no cube?
are you using ctrl+alt+ mouse 1?
make sure you have 4 viewpors in your settings too
not sure what u mean?
ok in ccsm, go to general options
and set horizontal size under the desktop size tab to 3 or 4
no cube just cylinder
yeah i got that. i think its funny. not sure, least you got it working some, i'd ask in #compiz
thanx. new to ubuntu how do i go to #compiz?
i am trying to save JRE to my ext. HD. located /media/My Book/home/chad. Terminal tells me that directory is bad command? I don't have enough int. hd space. Can i make this work?
i've read everything and used unetbootin which created ldlinux.sys file. tried to boot from that dive and said it couldn't find kernel.
check boot options then
try setting all boot options to cd
and make sure all attatched drives are detected
they are. that's what i'm trying to understand. why wouldn't it boot?
